botan.math.numbertheory.reducer

Modular Reducer

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

struct ModularReducer;
Modular Reducer (using Barrett's technique)

const BigInt multiply()(auto ref const BigInt x, auto ref const BigInt y);
Multiply mod p

Params:
BigInt x integer
BigInt y integer

Returns:
(x * y) % p

const BigInt square()(auto ref const BigInt x);
Square mod p

Params:
BigInt x integer

Returns:
(x * x) % p

const BigInt cube()(auto ref const BigInt x);
Cube mod p

Params:
BigInt x integer

Returns:
(x * x * x) % p
